<!-- enter ZIP code, Postcode, Post code, Postal code... --> |postal_code = |area_code = |website = |footnotes = }} '''Qiánxī'nán Buyei and Miao Autonomous Prefecture''' ({{zh|c=黔西南布依族苗族自治州|p=Qiánxī'nán Bùyīzú Miáozú Zìzhìzhōu}}) is an [[autonomous prefecture]] of [[Guizhou]] province in the [[People's Republic of China]]. ==Subdivisions== The prefecture is subdivided into 8 [[Administrative divisions of the People's Republic of China#County class|county-level divisions]]: 1 [[county-level city]] and 7 [[County (People's Republic of China)|counties]] *county level city: [[Xingyi, Guizhou |Xingyi]] (兴义市) *county: [[Wangmo County]] (望谟县), [[Xingren County]] (兴仁县), [[Pu'an County]] (普安县), [[Ceheng County]] (册亨县), [[Qinglong County, Guizhou|Qinglong County]] (晴隆县), [[Zhenfeng County]] (贞丰县), [[Anlong County]] (安龙县) <div align="left">{{Administrative Divisions of Qianxinan}}</div> {{Guizhou-geo-stub}} {{guizhou}} {{Miao autonomy in the People's Republic of China}} {{Other ethnic minorities autonomy in the People's Republic of China}} {{coord|25.0833|N|104.9|E|source:kolossus-euwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Autonomous prefectures of the People's Republic of China]] [[Category:Prefecture-level divisions of Guizhou]]
